thread.title: Post Malone Celebrates Success With Quavo in 'Congratulations' Video
thread.title_full: Post Malone Celebrates Success With Quavo in 'Congratulations' Video

author: NHHMS
title: Post Malone Celebrates Success With Quavo in 'Congratulations' Video
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/Post-Malone-congratulations-vid-2017-billboard-1548.jpg 
Post Malone is in a celebratory mood for his new video “Congratulations.” Set in slow motion, the clip finds a jovial Malone speaking on his newfound success. 
“They was never friendly, yeah/ Now I’m jumping out the Bentley,” he croons, later adding, “For the money, I’m a savage, yeah/ I be itching like an addict, yeah/ I’m surrounded, 20 bad b—hes, yeah/ But they didn’t know me last year, yeah/ Everyone wanna act like they important.” 
Migos member Quavo joins him in the festive visual and flexes on his haters with a huge stack of money. “Never old Ben-Ben Franklins/ Big rings, champagne/ My life is like a ball game/ But instead, I’m in the trap though/ Pot so big, call it Super Bowl,” Quavo raps. 
Malone’s debut album Stoney debuted at No. 6 its opening week last year on the Billboard 200 . 
Check out the video below. 
[embedded content]
